item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection Day 38: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandana’s mass entertainer continues to - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 38: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandana’s mass entertainer continues to shine on its 6th Saturday with the business of Rs 2 crore

Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

Despite being 38 days into its release, 'Pushpa 2' achieved a remarkable Rs 2 crore at the box office, showcasing its enduring popularity among audiences.

  • 'Pushpa 2' remains a mass entertainer, drawing in audiences.
  • On its 6th Saturday, the film grossed Rs 2 crore.
  • The film stars Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandana.
  • Positive audience reception contributes to its sustained performance.
The film continues to set box office records well into its sixth week.

This box office performance highlights the film's appeal and the strong fan base of its leading actors, promising continued success in the weeks to come.

item.title: Abhishek Bachchan makes a brief appearance as Amitabh Bachchan meets fans outside Jalsa, watches father from balcony - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Abhishek Bachchan makes a brief appearance as Amitabh Bachchan meets fans outside Jalsa

Date: Jan 13, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Amitabh Bachchan continued his Sunday tradition of meeting fans outside his residence, Jalsa, where his son Abhishek also made a brief appearance, adding to the excitement of the day.

  • Amitabh Bachchan greeted a crowd of fans who gathered outside his home.
  • He wore traditional attire and expressed gratitude towards his supporters.
  • Abhishek was seen watching from the balcony and waved to the crowd.
  • Amitabh reflected on the love and increasing numbers of fans in a blog post after the meet.
  • Both actors are involved in upcoming film projects.
“But the Sunday meet at the gate was as always awesome .. the numbers increase I think and the love even more .. I am so blessed.” - Amitabh Bachchan

Amitabh's weekly fan interactions showcase the enduring bond he shares with his supporters, while Abhishek's presence highlights the family's connection with their audience.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection Day 3: Ram Charan starrer sees collections fall under Rs 20 crore; mis - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection Day 3: Ram Charan starrer sees collections fall under Rs 20 crore; misses Rs 100 crore mark on debut weekend

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

On its third day, the film 'Game Changer' starring Ram Charan experienced a decline in box office collections, falling below Rs 20 crore, thus failing to reach the Rs 100 crore milestone in its opening weekend.

  • The film saw a significant drop in box office performance on Day 3.
  • It collected under Rs 20 crore, which is a sharp decline compared to earlier projections.
  • The total collections for the weekend fell short of Rs 100 crore.
“The film’s initial performance was promising, but it appears to have lost momentum quickly.”

This outcome raises questions about the film's long-term box office prospects and audience reception moving forward.

item.title: Inventing Anna actor Julia Garner interview: ‘Nothing’s ever really easy if you want it to be good' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Julia Garner Discusses Her Role in Wolf Man and the Challenges of Horror Films

Publication Date: N/A Source: Hindustan Times

In an interview with Hindustan Times, Julia Garner opens up about her transition from the hit Netflix series Inventing Anna to starring in the upcoming film Wolf Man, highlighting the unique experiences and challenges of horror filmmaking.

  • Garner reflects on her journey from playing a scam artist to starring in a traditional monster movie.
  • She describes Wolf Man as a film meant for the big screen, emphasizing the cinematic experience.
  • Garner's character, Charlotte, experiences emotional complexity as her husband transforms into a werewolf.
  • The preparation involved interviewing working mothers to portray Charlotte's struggles authentically.
  • Garner mentions the physical demands of the role, stating that it involved significantly more running than any previous projects.
“Nothing's ever really easy if you want it to be good. Usually, the simplest things are the hardest.” – Julia Garner

The film Wolf Man is not just a horror movie; it serves as a narrative about relationships, loss, and the fight for survival against overwhelming odds.

item.description:

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] Source: [Insert Source Here]

Chahat Pandey’s eviction from Bigg Boss 18 comes right before the grand finale, sparking discussions among fans. In a surprising turn of events, she reconciled with co-contestant Vivian by addressing him as 'Dsena Ji'.

  • Chahat Pandey is evicted just a week before the finale.
  • The unexpected reconciliation with Vivian is a highlight of her exit.
  • Fans speculate about the dynamics between contestants post-eviction.
“The journey was amazing, and I wish everyone the best,” said Chahat during her exit interview.

This turn of events adds an interesting layer to the ongoing season, keeping audiences engaged till the very end.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collection Day 1 (Early Trends): NBK Earns 35% More Than The Entire Lifetime Collection Of His Last Theatrical Release! - Koimoi
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collection Day 1 (Early Trends)

Publication Date: January 12, 2025

Source: Koimoi

Nandamuri Balakrishna’s new film, Daaku Maharaaj, is off to a strong start at the box office, surpassing the opening day earnings of his previous release, Bhagavanth Kesari.

  • The film earned between 22 to 24 crore on its opening day.
  • This is approximately 35% higher than Bhagavanth Kesari, which earned 16.6 crore.
  • Daaku Maharaaj opened 80% higher than Tollywood’s last Sankranti hit, HanuMan.
  • While it performed better than some releases, it fell short of rival Guntur Kaaram’s opening day total of 42 crore.
“Box office numbers are based on estimates and various sources. Numbers have not been independently verified by Koimoi.”

As the film continues its run over the Sankranti holiday, it remains to be seen whether it can sustain and improve its box office performance.

item.title: How Balayya Fans Got Punished in the USA.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
How Balayya Fans Got Punished in the USA

Publication Date: Date not provided Source: Not specified

This article discusses an incident where fans of Telugu actor Balakrishna displayed unruly behavior during a movie screening in Raleigh, North Carolina, leading to intervention by the theater manager.

  • The Telugu community in the USA often celebrates film releases with vibrant enthusiasm.
  • In a recent incident, Balayya fans created a disturbance, prompting the theater management to intervene.
  • The manager first warned the audience and then reduced the sound system when the behavior continued.
  • Ultimately, the screening was halted, but after appeals, it resumed under strict conditions.
“This incident highlights how undisciplined behavior can lead to consequences even in a foreign country.”

The article serves as a cautionary tale about maintaining decorum and respect for public spaces, regardless of cultural expressions of enthusiasm.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Chahat Pandey evicted, fans say 'she deserved to be in top 5 instead of Chugli gang' - DNA India
item.description:
Chahat Pandey Evicted from Bigg Boss 18: Fans React

Publication Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: DNA India

Chahat Pandey has been evicted from Bigg Boss 18, leaving seven contestants vying for the title. Fans express disappointment over her departure, believing she deserved a spot in the top five over the current 'Chugli gang'.

  • After Shrutika Arjun's eviction, Chahat's elimination occurs just before the finals.
  • Remaining contestants: Karan Veer Mehra, Avinash Mishra, Vivian Dsena, Eisha Singh, Rajat Dalal, Chum Darang, and Shilpa Shirodkar.
  • Viewers criticized the eviction, calling it unfair and biased.
  • The Grand Finale is set for January 19, 2025, with more evictions anticipated next week.
“Chahat deserved to be in top 5 instead of Chugli gang,” remarked an Instagram user.

The upcoming finale promises to be exciting with significant remaining contestants as they vie for victory in the highly popular reality show.

item.title: Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 3 (Early Trends): Concludes Opening Weekend In The Vicinity Of 25 Crores, All Eyes On Sankranti Holiday! - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 3 (Early Trends)

Publication Date: January 14, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Ram Charan and Kiara Advani's film, Game Changer, had a promising start but has seen a decline in box office collections as it concludes its opening weekend.

  • The film collected approximately 7.80-8.20 crores on Day 3, showing about a 7-3% drop from Day 2's 8.43 crores.
  • Total collections for the opening weekend stand between 24.87-25.27 crores.
  • Despite a strong opening, the film's performance is falling short compared to other regional releases, particularly Devara.

“Box office numbers are based on estimates and various sources. Numbers have not been independently verified by Koimoi.”

As the Sankranti holiday approaches, there could be an uptick in viewership, but the film’s fate will depend on its performance during the regular working days that follow.

item.title: Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli’s video with son Akaay goes viral, fans divided over face reveal - Bollywood Life
item.description:
Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli’s Video with Son Akaay Goes Viral, Fans Divided Over Face Reveal

Published: January 12, 2025 by Nikita Thakkar | Source: BollywoodLife

In a surprising turn of events, a video featuring Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli's son, Akaay, went viral, revealing his face for the first time to the public. The video has sparked mixed reactions among fans.

Key Points:

  • The couple has always been private about their children's appearances.
  • Akaay's face was revealed in a video after their trip to Vrindavan.
  • Fans expressed joy over seeing Akaay, while some criticized the breach of privacy.
  • This isn't the first instance of their children’s images causing controversy.

Notable Quotes:

"If you got to see Vamika's pic or maybe Akaay's. Keep it to yourself. Why to tell others?" — A user on social media.
"Akaay Kohli is so cute! Can't share his pic for privacy reasons but he is too cute!" — Another fan comment.

Conclusion:

The video highlights the ongoing tension between celebrity privacy and public interest, underscoring the challenges faced by public figures in protecting their family's privacy.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection day 3: Ram Charan, Shankar film beats Kamal Haasan's Indian 2, earns Rs... - DNA India
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 3: Ram Charan, Shankar film beats Indian 2

Publication Date: January 13, 2025

Source: DNA India

Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan and directed by Shankar, has surpassed the lifetime domestic earnings of the previous film Indian 2, grossing close to Rs 90 crore in its opening week.

  • Game Changer was released on January 10, 2025, and had a strong opening, collecting Rs 51 crore on its first day.
  • The film saw a drop to Rs 21.60 crore on its second day, totaling Rs 72.60 crore after two days.
  • On its third day, it earned Rs 16.33 crore, raising its total earnings near Rs 90 crore.
  • Game Changer has reportedly outperformed Indian 2, which earned Rs 82 crore net in India and grossed Rs 148 crore worldwide.
  • The film is made under a budget of Rs 250 crore and marks Shankar's Telugu cinema debut.
  • It will compete with other releases, including Daaku Maharaaj, which opened on January 12.
“Game Changer marks a significant entry for Shankar in Telugu cinema, showcasing the commercial viability of the film.”

In conclusion, Game Changer's successful opening reflects its appeal and strong box office performance against a backdrop of competitive releases.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna reveals media misquoted his statement about Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna reveals media misquoted his statement about Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff

Publication Date: Unknown Source: Unknown

Mukesh Khanna addressed a misinterpretation of his comments concerning Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff, clarifying the actual context of his statements.

  • Khanna expressed his surprise at the media's portrayal of his words.
  • He emphasized his respect for both Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff.
  • Khanna mentioned the need for accurate reporting to avoid misunderstandings.
“It's important that we don't misquote each other in the media.”

In conclusion, Khanna's response highlights the ongoing issue of media representation and miscommunication.

item.title: When Jaya Bachchan spoke out on Amitabh Bachchan’s rumoured affair with Rekha and if she’d mind them working together again: ‘My life would have been hell if…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Jaya Bachchan Reflects on Amitabh's Rumored Affair with Rekha

Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Despite being married for over 50 years, Jaya Bachchan shares her thoughts on the long-standing rumors regarding her husband Amitabh Bachchan and actress Rekha.

  • Gossip about Amitabh's relationship with Rekha persists despite their denials.
  • Jaya stated she would not object to Amitabh and Rekha working together, but acknowledges it would create a sensational atmosphere.
  • Her advice for maintaining a lasting marriage includes trust and not becoming overly possessive.
  • Amitabh and Rekha, celebrated on-screen partners, have not worked together for 43 years since their film Silsila.
“My life would have been hell if I had taken it all seriously. We are made of sterner stuff.” - Jaya Bachchan

Jaya Bachchan’s insights reveal her strong character and understanding of the complexities of relationships in the film industry.
